extension.summary: Hey One and All, Project Cypher takes no responsibility for the content or reliability of the feeds. Project Cypher [B]Does Not[/B] host any of the feeds or Streams. Most of the Code from this addon was taken from many other addons but used under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991. Please remember this is a free 3rd party addon so if something doesn't work! Its FREE! I Made this addon as a hobby Not as a service to anyone and i do not charge for it and shouldn't be treated as such. If you see any form of infringements, please contact appropriate media file owners or host sites immediately. Cypher Media is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a 3rd party plugin which has been added to your system or that you have freely installed.
